> <OLD>
>
> There was a HISS from DINOBOT, "Then dig underneath them and collapse the
> tunnel aboutthem.  Picking a fight by the ARK is suicide as we'll be SWARMED
> over by MAXIMALS before we can send out a comm signal."  He grins, "But I do
> assume if they are buried in some sort of rockslide we will have all the
> time while they're focused on rescuing thier brethren for us to secure the
> area."
>
> DINOBOT remained in his beast mode then, scanning the are, "If they come up
> aboveground, make yourselves scarce.  Our orders do not include being
> exterminated for no cause."  At least, not without WASPINATOR present.
>
> He shifted to glance over at HUN-GRR to see if the TERRORCON LEADER
> approved.  After all, he was the real one who could keep his 'enthusiastic'
> minions in line now.  If he openly disagreed with DINOBOT, thier field
> mission would turn into bickering, which they could not risk so close to the
> enemy stronghold.

<NEW>

HUN-GRRR was nodding as DINOBOT spoke although his optics never left
the tunnel opening. He and his TERRORCONS were also in beast mode,
using whatever protection it afforded them against being surprised.
However since all of them were the rough equivalent of being
transmetaled it would not be a perfect cover.

Fortunately they were far enough away from the ARK that it could not
scan them casually, although a directed scan might reveal them.

"Agreed." HUN-GRRR said with one of his heads, the other looked at the
other TERRORCONS. "Rippersnapper, Blot, excavate a tunnel and knock
down the Maximal tunnel!"

BLOT nodded, looking something like a a shark with legs and claws. "Me
Blot understand."

On the other hand RIPPERSNAPPER started to balk, "What? We're not
going to fight them?"

HUN-GRRR's other head turned to face RIPPERSNAPPER, "We will fight
when I give the command and not before." One of HUN-GRRR's heads
pointed back at the tunnel. "The coordinates are here, but we haven't
seen our objective. When we see that, *then* we can deal with the
Maximals."

There was a pause from RIPPERSNAPPER and then a nod, "On it." he said
as he took off towards the tunnel, BLOT quickly following behind.

One of HUN-GRRR's heads looked at DINOBOT, "I don't see anything like
the female said. If it's here it must be in the tunnels somewhere."

(TAG)

- Preston
